Posts.Content: herbert59 wrote: Hi all, i live in the uk and have had an itchy nipple on and off for nearly 3 months. sometimes its often, sometimes its once or twice a day and a quick scratch does the trick. no other changes to the area.  i've been to the docs and tried canesten, hydrocotisone and they help slightly but sometimes i also get a twinge like inside beneath the skin and i'm terrified i've got pagets disease. i go to the breast clinic this monday and am hoping they will give me a skin biopsy but i'm so scared and my husband can't come with me and ii think i will have a big cry! (like now!) has anybody got any advice or words of comfort?  is it pagets does anyone think? my friend had breast cancer at 30 and is still here 20 yrs later so i feel awful thinking about what are the chances of me having it too? thanks to you all.xx Log in to post a reply
